./bp_me/src/v/cce/bp_cce_top.v Cov: 91% 

   1: /**
   2:  *
   3:  * Name:
   4:  *   bp_cce_top.v
   5:  *
   6:  * Description:
   7:  *   This is the top level module for the CCE.
   8:  *
   9:  * Notes:
  10:  *   All inputs from the LCE are buffered. LCE Responses require a FIFO that can hold up to
  11:  *   N responses where N is the number of way groups managed per CCE. Future optimizations could
  12:  *   lessen this requirement to a 1 or 2 element FIFO. All other inputs use 2-FIFOs.
  13:  *
  14:  *   All input and output between the CCE and Memory are buffered. 2-FIFOs are used except for
  15:  *   the Mem Response network, where N entries are required (N defined same as above). N entries
  16:  *   are required because there may be up to 1 outstanding memory transaction per way group
  17:  *   from the CCE, and the CCE may not immediately sink the message. Sinking depends on the current
  18:  *   state of the microcode (e.g., the CCE could be processing some other request). The response
  19:  *   contains information that is needed to resume processing an LCE's request, so it can not be
  20:  *   automatically sunk without requiring additional storage buffers in the CCE itself.
  21:  *
  22:  *   Currently, it is assumed that N is the same for all CCEs in the system.
  23:  */
  24: 
  25: module bp_cce_top
  26:   import bp_common_pkg::*;
  27:   import bp_common_aviary_pkg::*;
  28:   import bp_cce_pkg::*;
  29:   import bp_cfg_link_pkg::*;
  30:   import bp_me_pkg::*;
  31:   #(parameter bp_cfg_e cfg_p = e_bp_inv_cfg
  32:     `declare_bp_proc_params(cfg_p)
  33: 
  34:     // Derived parameters
  35:     , localparam block_size_in_bytes_lp = (cce_block_width_p/8)
  36:     , localparam lg_num_cce_lp          = `BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(num_cce_p)
  37:     , localparam wg_per_cce_lp          = (lce_sets_p / num_cce_p)
  38: 
  39:     // interface widths
  40:     `declare_bp_lce_cce_if_widths(num_cce_p, num_lce_p, paddr_width_p, lce_assoc_p, dword_width_p, cce_block_width_p)
  41:     `declare_bp_me_if_widths(paddr_width_p, cce_block_width_p, num_lce_p, lce_assoc_p)
  42: 
  43:   )
  44:   (input                                                   clk_i
  45:    , input                                                 reset_i
  46:    , input                                                 freeze_i
  47: 
  48:    // Config channel
  49:    , input                                                 cfg_w_v_i
  50:    , input [cfg_addr_width_p-1:0]                          cfg_addr_i
  51:    , input [cfg_data_width_p-1:0]                          cfg_data_i
  52: 
  53:    // LCE-CCE Interface
  54:    // inbound: ready&valid
  55:    // Inputs to CCE from LCE are buffered by two element FIFOs
  56:    , input [lce_cce_req_width_lp-1:0]                      lce_req_i
  57:    , input                                                 lce_req_v_i
  58:    , output logic                                          lce_req_ready_o
  59: 
  60:    , input [lce_cce_resp_width_lp-1:0]                     lce_resp_i
  61:    , input                                                 lce_resp_v_i
  62:    , output logic                                          lce_resp_ready_o
  63: 
  64:    // outbound: ready&valid
  65:    // messages are not buffered by the CCE, and connection is directly to ME network
  66:    , output logic [lce_cmd_width_lp-1:0]                   lce_cmd_o
  67:    , output logic                                          lce_cmd_v_o
  68:    , input                                                 lce_cmd_ready_i
  69: 
  70:    // CCE-MEM Interface
  71:    // inbound: ready&valid, helpful consumer from demanding producer
  72:    // outbound: valid->yumi, helpful producer to demanding consumer
  73:    // Both inbound and outbound messages are buffered by two element FIFOs
  74:    , input [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]                      mem_resp_i
  75:    , input                                                 mem_resp_v_i
  76:    , output logic                                          mem_resp_ready_o
  77: 
  78:    , input [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]                      mem_cmd_i
  79:    , input                                                 mem_cmd_v_i
  80:    , output logic                                          mem_cmd_ready_o
  81: 
  82:    , output logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_cmd_o
  83:    , output logic                                          mem_cmd_v_o
  84:    , input                                                 mem_cmd_yumi_i
  85: 
  86:    , output logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_resp_o
  87:    , output logic                                          mem_resp_v_o
  88:    , input                                                 mem_resp_yumi_i
  89: 
  90:    , input [lg_num_cce_lp-1:0]                             cce_id_i
  91:   );
  92: 
  93:   logic [lce_cce_req_width_lp-1:0]               lce_req_to_cce;
  94:   logic                                          lce_req_v_to_cce;
  95:   logic                                          lce_req_yumi_from_cce;
  96:   logic [lce_cce_resp_width_lp-1:0]              lce_resp_to_cce;
  97:   logic                                          lce_resp_v_to_cce;
  98:   logic                                          lce_resp_yumi_from_cce;
  99:   logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_resp_to_cce;
 100:   logic                                          mem_resp_v_to_cce;
 101:   logic                                          mem_resp_yumi_from_cce;
 102:   logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_cmd_to_cce;
 103:   logic                                          mem_cmd_v_to_cce;
 104:   logic                                          mem_cmd_yumi_from_cce;
 105:   logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_cmd_from_cce;
 106:   logic                                          mem_cmd_v_from_cce;
 107:   logic                                          mem_cmd_ready_to_cce;
 108:   logic [cce_mem_msg_width_lp-1:0]               mem_resp_from_cce;
 109:   logic                                          mem_resp_v_from_cce;
 110:   logic                                          mem_resp_ready_to_cce;
 111: 
 112:   // Inbound LCE to CCE
 113:   bsg_two_fifo
 114:     #(.width_p(lce_cce_req_width_lp)
 115:       )
 116:     lce_cce_req_fifo
 117:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 118:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 119:       ,.v_i(lce_req_v_i)
 120:       ,.data_i(lce_req_i)
 121:       ,.ready_o(lce_req_ready_o)
 122:       ,.v_o(lce_req_v_to_cce)
 123:       ,.data_o(lce_req_to_cce)
 124:       ,.yumi_i(lce_req_yumi_from_cce)
 125:       );
 126: 
 127:   bsg_fifo_1r1w_small
 128:     #(.width_p(lce_cce_resp_width_lp)
 129:       // See top comments about sizing
 130:       ,.els_p(wg_per_cce_lp)
 131:       )
 132:     lce_cce_resp_fifo
 133:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 134:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 135:       ,.v_i(lce_resp_v_i)
 136:       ,.data_i(lce_resp_i)
 137:       ,.ready_o(lce_resp_ready_o)
 138:       ,.v_o(lce_resp_v_to_cce)
 139:       ,.data_o(lce_resp_to_cce)
 140:       ,.yumi_i(lce_resp_yumi_from_cce)
 141:       );
 142: 
 143:   // Inbound Mem to CCE
 144:   bsg_fifo_1r1w_small
 145:     #(.width_p(cce_mem_msg_width_lp)
 146:       // See top comments about sizing
 147:       ,.els_p(wg_per_cce_lp)
 148:       )
 149:     mem_cce_resp_fifo
 150:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 151:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 152:       ,.v_i(mem_resp_v_i)
 153:       ,.data_i(mem_resp_i)
 154:       ,.ready_o(mem_resp_ready_o)
 155:       ,.v_o(mem_resp_v_to_cce)
 156:       ,.data_o(mem_resp_to_cce)
 157:       ,.yumi_i(mem_resp_yumi_from_cce)
 158:       );
 159: 
 160:   bsg_two_fifo
 161:     #(.width_p(cce_mem_msg_width_lp)
 162:       )
 163:     mem_cce_cmd_fifo
 164:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 165:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 166:       ,.v_i(mem_cmd_v_i)
 167:       ,.data_i(mem_cmd_i)
 168:       ,.ready_o(mem_cmd_ready_o)
 169:       ,.v_o(mem_cmd_v_to_cce)
 170:       ,.data_o(mem_cmd_to_cce)
 171:       ,.yumi_i(mem_cmd_yumi_from_cce)
 172:       );
 173: 
 174:   // Outbound CCE to Mem
 175:   bsg_two_fifo
 176:     #(.width_p(cce_mem_msg_width_lp)
 177:       )
 178:     cce_mem_cmd_fifo
 179:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 180:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 181:       ,.v_i(mem_cmd_v_from_cce)
 182:       ,.data_i(mem_cmd_from_cce)
 183:       ,.ready_o(mem_cmd_ready_to_cce)
 184:       ,.v_o(mem_cmd_v_o)
 185:       ,.data_o(mem_cmd_o)
 186:       ,.yumi_i(mem_cmd_yumi_i)
 187:       );
 188: 
 189:   bsg_two_fifo
 190:     #(.width_p(cce_mem_msg_width_lp)
 191:       )
 192:     cce_mem_resp_fifo
 193:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 194:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 195:       ,.v_i(mem_resp_v_from_cce)
 196:       ,.data_i(mem_resp_from_cce)
 197:       ,.ready_o(mem_resp_ready_to_cce)
 198:       ,.v_o(mem_resp_v_o)
 199:       ,.data_o(mem_resp_o)
 200:       ,.yumi_i(mem_resp_yumi_i)
 201:       );
 202: 
 203:   // CCE
 204:   bp_cce
 205:     #(.cfg_p(cfg_p))
 206:     bp_cce
 207:      (.clk_i(clk_i)
 208:       ,.reset_i(reset_i)
 209:       ,.freeze_i(freeze_i)
 210: 
 211:       ,.cce_id_i(cce_id_i)
 212: 
 213:       ,.cfg_w_v_i(cfg_w_v_i)
 214:       ,.cfg_addr_i(cfg_addr_i)
 215:       ,.cfg_data_i(cfg_data_i)
 216: 
 217:       // To CCE
 218:       ,.lce_req_i(lce_req_to_cce)
 219:       ,.lce_req_v_i(lce_req_v_to_cce)
 220:       ,.lce_req_yumi_o(lce_req_yumi_from_cce)
 221:       ,.lce_resp_i(lce_resp_to_cce)
 222:       ,.lce_resp_v_i(lce_resp_v_to_cce)
 223:       ,.lce_resp_yumi_o(lce_resp_yumi_from_cce)
 224: 
 225:       // From CCE
 226:       ,.lce_cmd_o(lce_cmd_o)
 227:       ,.lce_cmd_v_o(lce_cmd_v_o)
 228:       ,.lce_cmd_ready_i(lce_cmd_ready_i)
 229: 
 230:       // To CCE
 231:       ,.mem_resp_i(mem_resp_to_cce)
 232:       ,.mem_resp_v_i(mem_resp_v_to_cce)
 233:       ,.mem_resp_yumi_o(mem_resp_yumi_from_cce)
 234:       ,.mem_cmd_i(mem_cmd_to_cce)
 235:       ,.mem_cmd_v_i(mem_cmd_v_to_cce)
 236:       ,.mem_cmd_yumi_o(mem_cmd_yumi_from_cce)
 237: 
 238:       // From CCE
 239:       ,.mem_cmd_o(mem_cmd_from_cce)
 240:       ,.mem_cmd_v_o(mem_cmd_v_from_cce)
 241:       ,.mem_cmd_ready_i(mem_cmd_ready_to_cce)
 242:       ,.mem_resp_o(mem_resp_from_cce)
 243:       ,.mem_resp_v_o(mem_resp_v_from_cce)
 244:       ,.mem_resp_ready_i(mem_resp_ready_to_cce)
 245:       );
 246: 
 247: endmodule
 248:
